name: Lluvia de slimes(demo)
description: Hi everyone, I'm glad to be in this jam. Before playing or trying the game I must tell you the controls, in the arrows on the keyboard you go right or left, in Z you build, in X you cut the trees, in C you destroy your blocks, in V you shoot the enemy, when you cut a tree it will give you 1 wood, when you have 2 wooden you can create fires by pressing the arrow on the keyboard, This campfire will damage the silt, this campfire will hurt the slimes. The game has a bug that I haven't been able to fix, when you die it will appear, you have to reopen the game and that's it. The game is in development, this is only a trial version, with your support I will be able to improve it and I will also accept suggestions in the comments When the sun goes down a box will appear, to win you have to go to the box and touch C. Thanks for reading.
